name: Bogusalaw Pawlik
story: Bogusalaw Pawlik grew up in a small village in Poland. He joined the military after finishing high school, hoping to serve his country and make his family proud. As an Ammo Bearer, he is responsible for ensuring his unit has a steady supply of ammunition during combat. His determination in this role has earned him the rank of Corporal. Bogusalaw is married and has a young daughter whom he hopes to raise in a peaceful world.
